page.title: 03HOOK NORTON LEISURE GROUPS
page.content: {The Choir} meets at St. Peters Church. They meet to sing God's Glory every Sunday. Special events include a Choir Festival. {The Church of England} services are held at St.Peter's Church, Hook Norton. Special event- St.Peter's Day garden party. {The Baptist Church} services are held in the Baptist Church, Netting Street. {The Methodist Church} services are held at the Wesleyan Methodist Chapel in Chapel Street. {The Roman Catholic Church} services are held at the chapel on the corner of Rope Way. {The Cricket Club} meets at the Sports and Social Club. {The Cub Scouts} meet at the Baptist Hall. Members-boys aged 8-11. Special events-camping,sports,St.George's Day Parade. Activities-badge work, games.
